name: Fiery Wrath
description: You transform your wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. Choose any number of creatures in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On failure, the creature takes 2d8 + MOVE dark damage and flinches. On success, they take half the damage and do not flinch.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
